title: dEvakI kanda
sahitya:
dEvakI kanda mukunda


caraNam 1    nigamOddhAra navanIta cOra khagapati vAhana jagadOddhAra
    caraNam 2    shankha cakradhara shrI gOvinda pankaja lOcana paramAnanda
    caraNam 3    makara kuNDaladhara mOhana vESa rukumiNI vallabha pANDava pOSa
    caraNam 4    kamsa mardana kaustubhAbharaNa hamsa vAhana pUjita caraNa
    caraNam 5    vara vElApura cenna prasanna puranda viTTala sakala guNa pUrNa
